snippet: Restrictions on the broadcasting of television historical dramas in China that recently went into effect may soon also extend to Web sites, according to a report released by a business analysis company.
abstract: Restriction on the broadcasting of television historical dramas in China that went into effect in January 2012 may soon also extend to Web sites.
lead_paragraph: Restrictions on the broadcasting of television historical dramas in China that recently went into effect may soon also extend to Web sites, according to a report released by a business analysis company.

headline.main: China: TV Limits May Hit the Web
headline.print_headline: China: TV Limits May Hit the Web
